    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Führerschein Prüfungsfragen 2002</string>
            <string language="en">Driving licence test questions 2002</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'essai de permis de conduire interroge 2002</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O teste da licença dirigindo questiona 2002</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La prova di patente di guida interroga 2002</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δοκιμή αδειών οδήγησης εξετάζει το 2002</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La prueba del carné de conducir pregunta 2002</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Zusammenstellung neuer Prüfungsaufgaben zur Erlangung des Führerscheins ab dem 1.2.2002. Mit Lösungen</string>
            <string language="en">Compilation of new test questions for the acquisition of the driving licence beginning with Feb 1. 2002. Including solutions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Führerschein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Driving licence</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compilation de nouvelles questions d'essai pour 
la saisie du permis de conduire commençant par fév. 1. 2002. 
Y compris des solutions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compilação de perguntas novas do teste para a 
aquisição da licença dirigindo que começa com fevereiro o 1. 
2002. Including soluções.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Compilazione di nuove domande della prova per 
l'aquisizione della patente di guida che comincia con il 1 febbraio. 
2002. Compreso le soluzioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταγλώττιση των νέων ερωτήσεων εξέτασης για την 
απόκτηση της άδειας οδήγησης αρχίζοντας με τις 1. του FEB 
2002, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των λύσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compilación de las nuevas preguntas de la prueba
para la adquisición del carné de conducir que comienza con de 
febrero el 1. 2002. Incluyendo soluciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Permis de conduire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Licença dirigindo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Patente di guida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αδεια οδήγησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carné de conducir</string>
          </keyword>
